title: Polki Chandbali - A Timeless Nizam Era Masterpiece
materials: 22K Gold base with Hyderabadi Polish. Adorned with Uncut Polki Diamonds and delicate Freshwater Pearls. Features accents of faceted Tourmaline gemstones in varying hues.
features: Exquisite Chandbali design reminiscent of the Nizam era. Features a central circular motif paved with dazzling Polki diamonds. Delicate pearls and colorful tourmaline drops add a touch of playful elegance. The top features a single large Polki stone with a halo of smaller diamonds. Intricate gold filigree work enhances the overall design, capturing the essence of Hyderabadi craftsmanship.
colors: Predominantly gold and white (from the Polki diamonds and pearls)
with colorful accents from the tourmaline gemstones in shades of green
occasions: and other grand celebrations. A statement piece for a modern bride or to elevate any festive ensemble.
description: This Chandbali is a true heirloom piece, showcasing the timeless beauty of Polki diamonds and Hyderabadi craftsmanship. The uncut diamonds provide a unique, raw elegance, while the colorful gemstones add a touch of modern flair. A valuable addition to any jewelry collection, representing cultural heritage and impeccable style.
